events.message: I am submitting a claim for a car accident that occurred yesterday at the intersection downtown.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident due to keywords identifying the vehicle collision involved.
An agent has been assigned to handle the customer's auto accident claim promptly and professionally.
The insurance company has acknowledged the receipt of the claim and assured the customer of quick processing.
We require police reports, photos of the damaged vehicle, and a copy of the driver's license to proceed.
Customer has submitted all the requested documentation including the police report and vehicle repair estimate.
The investigation into the claim details, including accident circumstances and liability, has officially commenced.
All facts have been verified, and the investigation concluded confirming the collision caused by another driver.
A settlement proposal covering vehicle repair costs and rental car expenses was sent to the customer.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the responsive service and the fair settlement offer for the auto accident.
The claim has been officially approved based on investigation findings and agreement with the settlement terms.
Payment for the approved amount was issued to cover repairs and additional costs related to the car accident.
The claim case has been closed following the full settlement payment and confirmation of customer satisfaction.
All documents and communications related to the accident claim have been archived for future reference.
